homePage.welcomeMessage: Your journey to mastering data architecture starts here. Explore our comprehensive modules and interactive exercises to build a strong foundation in modern data systems.
homePage.featureModernDesignDesc: Enjoy a clean, responsive interface accessible on all devices.
homePage.featureLightDarkDesc: Switch themes for comfortable viewing, day or night.
homePage.featureMultilingualDesc: Learn in your preferred language: English or Spanish.
homePage.featureProgressBarDesc: Monitor your learning journey with a visual progress bar.
homePage.featureInteractiveExercisesDesc: Reinforce your knowledge with hands-on activities for each module.
homePage.featureFeedbackDesc: Share your thoughts and suggestions to help us improve.

creditsPage.title: Credits
creditsPage.description: This OVA (Virtual Learning Object) on Introduction to Data Architecture was made possible by the contribution of the following individuals and technologies:
creditsPage.acknowledgementText: Special thanks to the open-source community and educational content creators whose work inspires and enables projects like this.

suggestionsPage.title: Suggestions
suggestionsPage.description: We value your feedback! Please use the form below to send us your suggestions, comments, or any issues you encounter.
suggestionsPage.successMessage: Thank you! Your suggestion has been submitted.
suggestionsPage.errorMessage: There was an error submitting your suggestion. Please try again.

courseModulesPage.title: Course Content
courseModulesPage.description: Explore the modules to learn about Data Architecture. Track your progress as you complete each topic.

modulePage.allTopicsCompleted: All topics in this module completed!

exercisesPage.title: Exercises
exercisesPage.description: Test your knowledge with interactive exercises for each module. Select an exercise to begin.
exercisesPage.noExercisesAvailable: No exercises available at the moment.
